Description:
You killed all the goblin raiders that were chasing the merchant.

The grateful merchant explains that he had to throw away most of his merchandise to run faster, but as a reward he gives you a small bag of gold and a VIP card.

He tells you that showing this card in some stores will give you special treatment.
DescriptionAction: You say goodbye to the merchant.
